member.name: PROPERTY_METRICS
member.summary: Defines the range and resolution of a packet property.

member.name: PROPERTY_METRICS.nLogicalMin
member.summary: The minimum value, in logical units, that the tablet reports for this property. For example, a tablet reporting x-values from 0 to 9000 has a logical minimum of 0.

member.name: PROPERTY_METRICS.nLogicalMax
member.summary: The maximum value, in logical units, that the tablet reports for this property. For example, a tablet reporting x-values from 0 to 9000 has a logical maximum of 9000.

member.name: PROPERTY_METRICS.Units
member.summary: The physical units of the property, such as inches or degrees. For a list of property units, see the enumeration type.

member.name: PROPERTY_METRICS.fResolution
member.summary: The resolution or increment value for the Units member. For example, a tablet that reports 400 dots per inch (dpi) has an fResoution value of 400.
